ComicInfo.Title: Who Says It Never Snows in Zymbodia?; ¡Mojado Power! (A Tale from Southern California); Bullnecks and Bracelets; The Secrets of Life and Death: Vol. 5; Flashback Mania
ComicInfo.Summary:
Who Says It Never Snows in Zymbodia?: Rena walks in heavy snowfall with a fuse to fix the rocketship her partners are stranded in.
¡Mojado Power! (A Tale from Southern California): The Garcia brothers rib on their cousin Correo while working in the field and later go out for a night on the town.
Bullnecks and Bracelets: Israel, haunted by the childhood disappearance of his sister, goes on a downward spiral as he binges and meets with friends and lovers both old and new.
The Secrets of Life and Death: Vol. 5: Hopey finishes reading volume five of Izzy's diary and wants to read the rest which involves her mysterious trip to Mexico. Then flashback to the ladies' teenage punk years as Hopey plays a trick on Terry and then later invites Maggie to a party at Del Chimney's place.
Flashback Mania: Hopey wakes up Maggie to ask her a silly question in this four-panel flashback sequence.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-30 20:24:21. [CVDB124203] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 21:58:20. [Issue ID 212405]
ComicInfo.Characters: Izzy Reubens,Doyle Blackburn,Maggie Chascarillo,Hopey Glass,Vicki Glori,Rena Titañon,Terry Downe
